channel.description: Recent content in tech on The Blag

item.title: Apps that I Love
item.description: Along the several years, I have been using computers and smartphones, I have discovered a few real gems that have adorned my gadgets. I present here a list of Applications, for desktop and mobile that I have loved using and would recommend to anyone within a heartbeat. Maybe you may already know some of them but perhaps the reasons why I like them would differ from yours, so read on!
